setCursedBondPercentage(uint256).details: Can only be called by the owner.

setEmbalmerClaimWindow(uint256).details: Can only be called by the diamond owner.

setExpirationThreshold(uint256).details: Can only be called by the diamond owner.

setGracePeriod(uint256).details: Can only be called by the diamond owner.

setProtocolFeeBasePercentage(uint256).details: Can only be called by the owner.

withdrawProtocolFees().details: Can only be called by the owner.

CannotSetZeroValue().notice: Admin has attempted to set a zero value

setCursedBondPercentage(uint256).notice: Sets the digging fee / cursed bond ratio used to calculate how much bond archaeologists must lock per curse.

setExpirationThreshold(uint256).notice: Updates the expirationThreshold used during sarcophagus creation

setProtocolFeeBasePercentage(uint256).notice: Sets the protocol fee base percentage, used to calculate protocol fees

withdrawProtocolFees().notice: Withdraws the total protocol fee amount from the contract.
